title: A Multicenter Assessment of the Accuracy of Claims Data in Appendicitis Research
details: BR Beaulieu-Jones, AD Laudon, S Duraiswamy… - Annals of Surgery, 2025
abstract: Objective: To investigate accuracy of ICD-9/10 billing codes in a multicenter cohort Summary of Background Data: Health services research on appendicitis often relies on administrative databases. However, billing codes may misclassify disease …
